classes.name: Artificer
classes.description: A master of invention who uses ingenuity and magic to unlock extraordinary capabilities in objects.

classes.name: Barbarian
classes.description: A fierce warrior who can enter a battle rage.

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature and adopting animal forms.

classes.name: Fighter
classes.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: A warrior who combats threats on the edges of civilization.

classes.name: Rogue
classes.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline.

classes.name: Warlock
classes.description: A wielder of magic derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality.

races.name: Human
races.description: Versatile and ambitious, humans are the most adaptable of all races.

races.name: High Elf
races.description: High elves are graceful and intelligent, with a natural affinity for magic.

races.name: Wood Elf
races.description: Wood elves are fleet of foot and stealthy, at home in the wilderness.

races.name: Hill Dwarf
races.description: Hill dwarves are tough and resilient, with keen senses and deep intuition.

races.name: Mountain Dwarf
races.description: Mountain dwarves are strong and hardy, accustomed to life in rugged terrain.

races.name: Lightfoot Halfling
races.description: Lightfoot halflings are naturally stealthy and social, adept at avoiding notice.

races.name: Stout Halfling
races.description: Stout halflings are hardier than most, with a resistance to poison.

races.name: Dragonborn
races.description: Proud dragon-kin with a breath weapon and draconic resistance.

races.name: Half-Elf
races.description: Combining the best of elves and humans, half-elves are charismatic and versatile.

races.name: Half-Orc
races.description: Fierce and enduring, half-orcs combine human versatility with orcish strength.

races.name: Tiefling
races.description: Descended from fiends, tieflings possess innate magical abilities and dark resilience.

races.name: Rock Gnome
races.description: Inventive and curious, rock gnomes are natural tinkerers with a knack for illusions.

races.name: Forest Gnome
races.description: Shy and secretive, forest gnomes have a natural talent for illusion and stealth.

races.name: Drow
races.description: Dark elves with innate spellcasting, hailing from the Underdark.
